title: I_Anime
author: I_Anime
content: What is kidney stone :Kidney stones are hard deposits of minerals and acid salts that stick together in concentrated urine.Causes :drinking too little water, Having a diet that includes the substances that form the stones, obesity, weight loss surgery, or eating food with too much salt or sugar. It is also Hereditary. Symptoms :Feeling pain in your lower back or side of your bodySeeing blood in your urine.Being unable to urinateFeeling the need to urinate more oftenHaving urine that smells bad Prevention :Stay hydrated  Limit salt intake Limit meat intake Eat Calcium containing balance dietPlease rate a friend  Tips for preventing Kidney stone :https://youtu.be/xPBkx838dzQ

comments.author: mich
comments.body: I remember the worse pain ever felt in my entire life was when I passed a Kidney Stone. I was walking in a parking lot going to get some dinner and I suddenly fell over in a extreme feeling of pain. There was a ambulance called for me and I went right to the emergency room, I will never forget this day for the rest of my life.  The Doctors told me this was a worse feeling of pain then a woman giving birth to her child. I can not wish this pain on my biggest enemy it was so painful.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: I’ve never had a kidney stone but my sister had gallstones & had to have the whole gallbladder removed. She said it was the worst pain she’s ever experienced. It’s important to be aware of your body & see your doctor if you experience any ached or pains.Kidney stones are very unpleasant but not life threatening. They’re usually diagnosed by having an ultrasound scan. Just be aware of any changes you see & report them to a doctor. Delaying seeing a doctor can cause you much more problems & much more pain.
